source:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_SEQ_00<tab>Godriquelain is eager to resume his investigation of the Continental Circus.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_SEQ_00<tab>※本クエストは、期間限定のクエストとなります。

リムサ・ロミンサのゴドリクランは、「コンチネンタル・サーカス」の捜査を開始したいようだ。

source:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_SEQ_01<tab>Godriquelain has learned that the Continental Circus is also recruiting volunteers for its festive endeavors in Limsa Lominsa. In order to prevent the Night of Devilry from coming to pass, you must pretend to cooperate with the twisted troupe, that you might uncover the details of their dark plot. Speak with the untrustworthy illusionist near the Aftcastle, and offer your services to him.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストは、シーズナルイベント開催中にかぎり、
　受注、進行できます。
　開催期間終了後は進行できませんので、ご注意ください。
　期間等の詳細についてはLodestoneをご覧ください。

ゴドリクランと話し、リムサ・ロミンサでの捜査を開始した。リムサ・ロミンサのアフトカースルにいる「不気味な奇術師」に話しかけ、彼らに協力するフリをしながら企みを暴こう。

source:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_SEQ_02<tab>The untrustworthy illusionist has entrusted you with three pumpkin lanterns, which he bids you place at three locations in Limsa Lominsa, and in the order specified. The first lantern is bound for the Drowning Wench.

※If the illusion wears off, you may receive it again by speaking with the untrustworthy illusionist.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_SEQ_02<tab>不気味な奇術師と話し、溺れた海豚亭、コーラルタワー、黒渦団：軍令部の順にランタンを置いていくことになった。「変身状態」でリムサ・ロミンサの溺れた海豚亭にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E978701 /var>」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A5901 /var>」を置こう。

※アフトカースルにいる「不気味な奇術師」に話しかけると「変身状態」になれます。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_SEQ_03<tab>You have convinced Baderon to let you place a pumpkin lantern inside the Drowning Wench. Now make your way to the Coral Tower, and find a likely spot for the second lantern.
target: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_SEQ_03<tab>溺れた海豚亭に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A5901 /var>を置いた。次は「変身状態」でリムサ・ロミンサのコーラルタワーにある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E978801 /var>」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A5901 /var>」を置こう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_SEQ_04<tab>With some conditions, Commodore Reyner permits you to leave the second pumpkin lantern inside the Coral Tower. The third and final lantern is earmarked for Maelstrom Command. Make your way there, and find a likely spot for it.
target: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_SEQ_04<tab>コーラルタワーに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A5901 /var>を置いた。次は「変身状態」でリムサ・ロミンサの黒渦団：軍令部にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E978901 /var>」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A5901 /var>」を置こう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_SEQ_05<tab>Though Commander R'ashaht Rhiki consents to your leaving the third pumpkin inside Maelstrom Command, she warns you that the Maelstrom will not be responsible for its care. You have now placed the three lanterns as prescribed. Return to the Aftcastle and report your success to the untrustworthy illusionist.
target: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_SEQ_05<tab>黒渦団：軍令部に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A5901 /var>を置いた。アフトカースルにいる「不気味な奇術師」と話そう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_SEQ_06<tab>It appears that the untrustworthy illusionist had been plotting to summon forth a horde of dark creatures, and he would have succeeded─with your help─were it not for the unwitting intervention of the locals. For now, you are assured in the knowledge that the realm is safe. Return to Godriquelain and report all that you have seen and heard.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_SEQ_06<tab>不気味な奇術師の目的は、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A5901 /var>で魔法陣を作り、大量の魔物を召喚することだったようだ。しかし、召喚が成功する前に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A5901 /var>は撤去され、不気味な奇術
師の陰謀は潰えた。アフトカースル付近にいる「ゴドリクラン」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_SEQ_07<tab>Though relieved for the present, Godriquelain fears that the Continental Circus may yet usher in the Night of Devilry. He bids you meet him in Ul'dah, where another dark scheme is in the offing. Make haste to the sultanate, and join Godriquelain in the vicinity of the Ruby Road Exchange.
target: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_SEQ_07<tab>ゴドリクランに報告し、ウルダハでも「コンチネンタル・サーカス」への潜入捜査を続けることになった。ウルダハのルビーロード国際市場付近にいる「ゴドリクラン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_SEQ_08<tab>You arrive in Ul'dah and find Godriquelain waiting at the Ruby Road Exchange. Take a deep breath and steel yourself, for the night promises to be dark and full of terrors.
target: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_SEQ_08<tab>ゴドリクランと話した。手を出す必要もなく失敗を重ねた「コンチネンタル・サーカス」だが、このウルダハではどんな陰謀を企てているのだろうか？冒険者の潜入捜査は続いていく……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_000_000<tab>Since arriving in Limsa Lominsa, I have conducted a preliminary investigation into Continental Circus activities.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_000_000<tab>準備はよろしいですか？
それでは、捜査を再開しましょう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_000_001<tab>As was the case in Gridania, they are calling for unsuspecting volunteers, doubtless to help them bring their vile plot to fruition. We must uncover precisely what they mean to do, that we can prevent the Night of Devilry from coming to pass.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_000_001<tab>どうやら「コンチネンタル・サーカス」は、
この都市でも、悪しき陰謀を企てているようです。
「不気味な奇術師」が協力者を探していましたからね。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_000_002<tab>The tactic we previously employed to gather intelligence worked like a charm, and I see no reason why it will not work again. Go to the illusionist nearby, and offer your services to him. Keep your eyes and ears open, and learn all you can.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_000_002<tab>「不気味な奇術師」は、この辺りにいるはずです。
前回と同じく彼らに協力したフリをして、企みを暴きましょう。
……まったく、大事がなければよいのですが。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_000_003<tab>The tactic we previously employed to gather intelligence worked like a charm, and I see no reason why it will not work again. Go to the illusionist nearby, and offer your services to him. Keep your eyes and ears open, and learn all you can.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_000_003<tab>「不気味な奇術師」は、この辺りにいるはずです。
前回と同じく彼らに協力したフリをして、企みを暴きましょう。
……まったく、大事がなければよいのですが。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_010<tab>Well met and welcome, adventurer. I'm given to understand that you assisted our troupe's activities in Gridania. I would be much obliged if you would assist us here as well.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_010<tab>ほう、お主はグリダニアで仲間に協力してくれた冒険者か？
一座の仲間から話は聞いておるぞ。
ぜひ、ワシにも手を貸してほしい。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_011<tab>Now then, no All Saints' Wake would be complete without pumpkin lanterns. Alas, Limsa Lominsa is sorely lacking in them. I would remedy this with your help.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_011<tab>「守護天節」にはカボチャのランタンがつきものなのだが、
この都市には、どうにもランタンが足りておらん！

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_012<tab>I shall give you three pumpkin lanterns, which you must place at the locations─and in the exact order─I specify.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_012<tab>これでは「守護天節」の盛り上がりも欠けようというもの！
ゆえに、今から渡す「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A5901 /var>」を、
都市内に置いてきてはくれんか？

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_013<tab>The Drowning Wench is your first destination, after which you are to go to the Coral Tower. Last but not least is Maelstrom Command. Be certain to remember this.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_013<tab>そうだな……置く場所は「溺れた海豚亭」、
「コーラルタワー」、「黒渦団：軍令部」の3ヶ所でいいだろう。
必ずこの順番で「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A5901 /var>」を置くのだぞ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_014<tab>What is the significance of this order, you ask? Why, it is essential in creating the magicked patterns by which we shall usher in a night of ter─er...<var 1A 02 /var>terrific<var 1A 01 /var> fun. Y<var 1F /var>Yes, that's right─terrific fun for one and all!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_014<tab>……なに、なぜ順番が決められているのかって？
それは魔法陣を……ごにょごにょ……ゴホン！
と、ともかく、伝えた順に置いてくれればいい。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_015<tab>With that established, I shall use the art of illusion to lend you a form most intimidating. No one will dare obstruct your lantern placing, and we shall be one step closer to realizing our ambition!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_015<tab>では、今からお主に、変身の奇術をかける。
「恐ろしい姿」をしていれば、
都市民どもが、あえて邪魔をしてくることもないだろうからな！

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_016<tab>Remember, your first destination is the Drowning Wench.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_016<tab>最初は「溺れた海豚亭」に
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A5901 /var>」を置いてくるのだ。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_017<tab>Hm, the illusion has faded, has it? I shall refresh it for you. See to it that all the lanterns are where they are supposed to be.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_017<tab>ぬう、変身が解けているではないか！
仕方ない、変身の奇術をかけ直してやるから、
とっとと「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A5901 /var>」を置いてくるのだ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_SYSTEM_000_017<tab>This person seems to be deep in thought, and does not respond.
target: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_SYSTEM_000_017<tab>何かに夢中で、こちらに気付いていないようだ……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_BADERON_000_020<tab>(-Baderon-)Oi, what do ye think yer doin'? No junk on me bar!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_BADERON_000_020<tab>(-バデロン-)……！？
ちょっと、お前さん何を置いて……

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_BADERON_100_020<tab>(-Baderon-)A monster...with a lantern!? What kind o' twisted joke's this!?
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_BADERON_100_020<tab>(-バデロン-)って、魔物だと！？
魔物がランタンを置くなんて、何の冗談だ！？

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_BADERON_000_021<tab>(-Baderon-)Oi, what do ye think yer doin'? No junk on me bar!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_BADERON_000_021<tab>(-バデロン-)……！？
ちょっと、お前さん何を置いて……

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_BADERON_100_021<tab>(-Baderon-)A-Admiral!? I weren't expectin' ye fer a couple o' bells yet! An' beggin' yer pardons, but that lantern...?
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_BADERON_100_021<tab>(-バデロン-)って、メルウィブ提督！？　もうお越しで！？
それにしても、なぜ提督が店にランタンを……？

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_BADERON_000_022<tab>(-Baderon-)...An illusion, ye say? Bugger me, I should've known. The sight of it all was so absurd, fer a moment I thought I was hallucinatin'─an' I 'aven't smoked the sort o' stuff what does that to ye in years. Good to know I 'aven't gone an' lost me wits.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_BADERON_000_022<tab>(-バデロン-)……ははぁ、さては変身の奇術を使ってるのか。
酔ってもいねえのに、悪い夢でも見たのかと思ったぜ。
とりあえず、お前さんの事情は了解した。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_BADERON_000_023<tab>(-Baderon-)Now, ye were sayin' ye wanted to put yer lantern 'ere? This bein' All Saints' Wake an' all, I ain't averse to a few decorations, but this thing's bleedin' enormous! What with the Admiral an' 'er retinue comin', I'd rather not 'ave the place cluttered...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_BADERON_000_023<tab>(-バデロン-)せっかくの「守護天節」だ、ランタンを置くのは構わねえが……
さすがにコイツは大きすぎじゃねえか？
近々、メルウィブ提督も来るってのにどうするかねえ……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_BADERON_000_024<tab>(-Baderon-)Look, there's no point in me keepin' ye. Jus' leave that thing with me, I'll find a spot fer it, alright?
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_BADERON_000_024<tab>(-バデロン-)おっと、とりあえずご苦労さん。
邪魔にならない方法は、こっちで考えておくぜ。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_BADERON_000_025<tab>(-Baderon-)Bugger me, the Admiral an' 'er retinue's arrivin' soon, but I ain't even started preparin' yet. We're gonna need more grog, that's fer sure. A <var 1A 02 /var>lot<var 1A 01 /var> more grog...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_BADERON_000_025<tab>(-バデロン-)メルウィブ提督の来店に合わせて、仕込みをしておかねえと……。
……さて、何から手を付けたものか。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_BADERON_000_026<tab>(-Baderon-)Bah, where to put this thing... If only it weren't this bleedin' enormous...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_BADERON_000_026<tab>(-バデロン-)うーん、形は悪くないんだがなぁ……。
この大きさが邪魔だな、どうしたもんか。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_027<tab>You've placed a lantern at the Drowning Wench? Wonderful! Lest you've forgotten, the second one is bound for the Coral Tower. Off you go now!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_027<tab>ふむ、「溺れた海豚亭」に置いてきてくれたか！
次は「コーラルタワー」に、
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A5901 /var>」を置いてきてくれ。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_000_028<tab>I know full well the great burden I've placed upon you, but the safety of the citizenry is at stake. For their sake, you must continue the investigation.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_000_028<tab>大変だと思いますが、捜査をお願いします。
僕が彼らに近づけない以上、
「守護天節」の平和を守れるのは君だけなのです！

source:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_100_028<tab>Uwaaah!?
...Oh, it's only you. Looking sharp, my friend. Pray carry on with the investigation. Remember, the safety of the citizenry is at stake.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_100_028<tab>わわわっ！？
……って、君でしたか。
大変だと思いますが、捜査をお願いします。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_SYSTEM_000_029<tab>In order to progress further in the quest, you must be under the transfigured status.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_SYSTEM_000_029<tab>このクエストを進行させるには、
「変身状態」である必要があります。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_REYNER_000_030<tab>(-Reyner-)You there! What do you think you're doing with that─
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_REYNER_000_030<tab>(-レイナー-)……！？
君、勝手に何を……

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_REYNER_100_030<tab>(-Reyner-)What's this!? You will rue the day you dared enter the Coral Tower, vile fiend!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_REYNER_100_030<tab>(-レイナー-)なに、魔物……ッ！？
くっ、私の銃の腕前を見せるときがきたようだな！

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_REYNER_000_031<tab>(-Reyner-)You there! What do you think you're doing with that─
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_REYNER_000_031<tab>(-レイナー-)……！？
君、勝手に何を……

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_REYNER_100_031<tab>(-Reyner-)A-Admiral! M-My apologies! I did not notice that it was you! If I might make bold, however, you do not seem to be yourself today. Are you feeling unwell?
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_REYNER_100_031<tab>(-レイナー-)メ、メルウィブ提督！？　こ、これは失礼いたしましたッ！
いや、しかし……雰囲気がいつもと違うような……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_REYNER_000_032<tab>(-Reyner-)...Illusion magicks for the All Saints' Wake festivities? Setting aside the unwarranted start you gave me, it certainly is a very convincing disguise.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_REYNER_000_032<tab>(-レイナー-)……ふむ、なるほど。
変身の奇術を使っていたのか。
「守護天節」の余興というわけだな。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_REYNER_000_033<tab>(-Reyner-)And as for the lantern, I do not object to your placing it here, but be forewarned that I may later have it removed at my discretion.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_REYNER_000_033<tab>(-レイナー-)私個人としては、この飾り付けに異論はないが……
警備の都合で、撤去することになるかもしれない。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_REYNER_000_034<tab>(-Reyner-)We are expecting the Admiral to come here for inspection, you see, and when she does, the Coral Tower must be in immaculate order. This means no decorations, seasonal or otherwise.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_REYNER_000_034<tab>(-レイナー-)間もなくメルウィブ提督が視察に来られるということで、
我々も常時より慎重になっているのだ。
……撤去するか、悩むところだな。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_REYNER_000_035<tab>(-Reyner-)If you have business, I ask that you speak with one of my people. I must needs make the tower ready for the Admiral's inspection.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_REYNER_000_035<tab>(-レイナー-)すまないが、忙しいので後にしてくれ。
メルウィブ提督の視察に備えなければ……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_REYNER_000_036<tab>(-Reyner-)I must confess, the lantern is beginning to grow on me. Mind you, this does not mean that it can stay when the Admiral comes.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_REYNER_000_036<tab>(-レイナー-)君には悪いが、やはり撤去するか……？
いや、案外このままで悪くない気もするな……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_037<tab>So you've placed the second lantern at the Coral Tower? Well done! That leaves us with just the one for Maelstrom Command. Run along and see it done.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_037<tab>「コーラルタワー」にも置いてきてくれたか。
よくやってくれた、感謝する！
残る場所は「黒渦団：軍令部」だけだ、頼んだぞ。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_000_038<tab>I know full well the great burden I've placed upon you, but the safety of the citizenry is at stake. For their sake, you must continue the investigation.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_000_038<tab>大変だと思いますが、捜査をお願いします。
僕が彼らに近づけない以上、
「守護天節」の平和を守れるのは君だけなのです！

source:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_100_038<tab>Uwaaah!?
...Oh, it's only you. Looking sharp, my friend. Pray carry on with the investigation. Remember, the safety of the citizenry is at stake.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_100_038<tab>わわわっ！？
……って、君でしたか。
大変だと思いますが、捜査をお願いします。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_SYSTEM_000_039<tab>In order to progress further in the quest, you must be under the transfigured status.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_SYSTEM_000_039<tab>このクエストを進行させるには、
「変身状態」である必要があります。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_RASHAHT_000_040<tab>(-R'ashaht Rhiki-)What in the name of the Navigator are you doing with that thing!?
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_RASHAHT_000_040<tab>(-ル・アシャ大甲佐-)ちょっとちょっと！　ここは黒渦団の軍令部だよ？
勝手なことしちゃ……

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_RASHAHT_100_040<tab>(-R'ashaht Rhiki-)A fiend!? You are either bold or foolish to come here! Say your prayers to whatever dark gods you keep!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_RASHAHT_100_040<tab>(-ル・アシャ大甲佐-)って、魔物じゃないか！
黒渦団へ殴りこみにくるなんて、いい度胸だね！
こうなりゃ、全軍出撃でボッコボコに……

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_RASHAHT_000_041<tab>(-R'ashaht Rhiki-)What in the name of the Navigator are you doing with that thing!?
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_RASHAHT_000_041<tab>(-ル・アシャ大甲佐-)ちょっとちょっと！　ここは黒渦団の軍令部だよ？
勝手なことしちゃ……

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_RASHAHT_100_041<tab>(-R'ashaht Rhiki-)<gasp> A-Admiral! W-We were not expecting you quite so soon! Of course, if you wish to begin the inspection now...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_RASHAHT_100_041<tab>(-ル・アシャ大甲佐-)って、メルウィブ提督！？
お、お、お早いご到着で……！
このカボチャは、ええと……あたしたちに特別賞与とか？

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_RASHAHT_000_042<tab>(-R'ashaht Rhiki-)...An adventurer in disguise? Seven hells! Festive season or no, I would thank you not to startle me unduly while I am on duty─which is always!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_RASHAHT_000_042<tab>(-ル・アシャ大甲佐-)…………なんだ、変身した冒険者だったのか。
びっくりさせてくれるなぁ、もうっ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_RASHAHT_000_043<tab>(-R'ashaht Rhiki-)Now, I personally have no issues with your leaving the pumpkin lantern here, but know that the Maelstrom will not be responsible for its care.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_RASHAHT_000_043<tab>(-ル・アシャ大甲佐-)それで、カボチャのランタンを置いておいてほしいって？
あたしはぜんぜん構わないけど……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_RASHAHT_000_044<tab>(-R'ashaht Rhiki-)We will not hear any complaints if it gets damaged. Furthermore, if it's deemed a nuisance, it will be summarily removed. I trust I have made myself clear.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_RASHAHT_000_044<tab>(-ル・アシャ大甲佐-)うーん、軍令部の雰囲気に合ってないなぁ。
不審物と間違われて、撤去されちゃうかも。
……そのときはごめんね？

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_RASHAHT_000_045<tab>(-R'ashaht Rhiki-)'Tis been a while since the Admiral last graced us with an inspection. We must see to it that everything is to her satisfaction.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_RASHAHT_000_045<tab>(-ル・アシャ大甲佐-)えっと、視察の項目は……。
メルウィブ提督がいらっしゃるのは、何時だったっけ……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_RASHAHT_000_046<tab>(-R'ashaht Rhiki-)Remember, the Maelstrom is not responsible for the care of the lantern. We will not hear any complaints if it gets damaged, and if it's deemed a nuisance, it will be summarily removed.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_RASHAHT_000_046<tab>(-ル・アシャ大甲佐-)このカボチャのランタン、悪くはないんだけどね。
設置場所に問題があるかなあ……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_000_047<tab>I know full well the great burden I've placed upon you, but the safety of the citizenry is at stake. For their sake, you must continue the investigation.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_000_047<tab>大変だと思いますが、捜査をお願いします。
僕が彼らに近づけない以上、
「守護天節」の平和を守れるのは君だけなのです！

source:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_100_047<tab>Uwaaah!?
...Oh, it's only you. Looking sharp, my friend. Pray carry on with the investigation. Remember, the safety of the citizenry is at stake.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_100_047<tab>わわわっ！？
……って、君でしたか。
大変だと思いますが、捜査をお願いします。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_SYSTEM_000_048<tab>In order to progress further in the quest, you must be under the transfigured status.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_SYSTEM_000_048<tab>このクエストを進行させるには、
「変身状態」である必要があります。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_100_050<tab>Ah, you are returned. The illusion has served its purpose. Here, allow me to remove it for you.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_100_050<tab>帰ったか、冒険者よ！
それでは変身を解いてやろう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_051<tab>So, you have placed all the lanterns, yes? Wonderful, wonderful!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_051<tab>ランタンは、指示どおりに置いてきたのだな？
ククッ……うむ、実に素晴らしい……！

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_100_051<tab>Being the fools that they are, they did not even suspect our motive! And now the magicked pattern is complete, precisely to that woman's specifications!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_100_051<tab>愚かなヒトでは、到底気付けなかっただろう！
お主がカボチャのランタンを置いたことにより、
「カボチャ頭の女」が教えてくれた魔法陣が完成した！

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_052<tab>'Tis only a matter of time before the gate bursts open! My dark brethren will overrun this realm, and the Night of Devilry shall come again! Ahahahaha!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_052<tab>しばらくすれば魔法陣が「扉」を開き、
大量の魔物たちを、こちら側に招き入れることだろう！
そして、我らが目的……「魔人の夜」が再現されるのだ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_SYSTEM_100_052<tab>A conversation between two Yellowjackets carries over to you.
target: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_SYSTEM_100_052<tab>イエロージャケット警備兵たちの声が聞こえてくる……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_YELLOWA65773_000_053<tab>Oi, 'ave ye 'eard? Some daft sod's been goin' around leavin' these creepy dark pumpkins all over the city.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_YELLOWA65773_000_053<tab>……まったく、お祭り騒ぎには困ったもんだ！
「守護天節」に乗じて、邪魔になるような場所にまで、
馬鹿でかいランタンを置く奴がいてさ……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_YELLOWB65773_000_054<tab>Aye, I did hear about that. One each at the Drowning Wench, the Coral Tower, and Maelstrom Command, right? What's to be done about them?
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_YELLOWB65773_000_054<tab>ああ、すっごい邪魔な「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A5901 /var>」があったわね。
溺れた海豚亭と、コーラルタワーと、黒渦団の軍令部だっけ。
……あれ、撤去したのかしら？

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_YELLOWA65773_000_055<tab>They've already been rounded up an' thrown out, if that's what yer askin'. Can't leave that shite lyin' about─people might take a tumble an' 'urt 'emselves!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_YELLOWA65773_000_055<tab>もちろん、すっぱり撤去してやったさ！
あんな場所に置かれてちゃ、嫌がらせもいいとこだからな。
提督の視察もあるし、放置しちゃおけないだろう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_YELLOWB65773_000_056<tab>Right! Safety first!
target: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_YELLOWB65773_000_056<tab>あはは、当たり前よね～。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_058<tab>Errr... Lest you misunderstand, that was but a...a <var 1A 02 /var>summary<var 1A 01 /var> of the, er...<var 1A 02 /var>play<var 1A 01 /var> we're planning as part of the festivities. Th-That's right, a stage play! The premise is very original, do you not agree?
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_058<tab>……ゴホン、か、勘違いしないでほしいのだが、
ワシが先ほど述べたのは、お主を楽しませるための物語だ。
ど、どうだ？　ハラハラしちゃっただろう？

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_059<tab>'Tis a shame that our <var 1A 02 /var>props<var 1A 01 /var> were removed before the play could take place. We must remember not to make the same mistake next time... <sigh>
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_059<tab>しかし、物語を優先して時期と場所を決めたばかりに、
飾りつけを撤去されてしまうとは！
アハハ、ハハ……この教訓は、次に生かすとしよう……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_060<tab>A-At any rate, you have more than done your part here in Limsa Lominsa. We would be most grateful if you could next help out with the festivities in Ul'dah. My thanks again, adventurer!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_060<tab>う、運悪く失敗したが、お主の働きは十分だった。
もうこの地にお主の力を活かせる場はない。
次は「ウルダハ」へ向かってくれ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_PUMPKIN65772_000_061<tab>(-Pumpkin-headed Woman-)Heh heh heh... Such charming children... The best is yet to come─pray enjoy All Saints' Wake to the fullest...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_PUMPKIN65772_000_061<tab>(-カボチャ頭の女？-)クス……クスクス……本当に面白い子たち……。
さあ、もっと「守護天節」を楽しみましょう……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_062<tab>You have more than done your part here in Limsa Lominsa. We would be most grateful if you could next help out with the festivities in Ul'dah. My thanks again, adventurer.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_CONJURER65773_000_062<tab>お主の働きに礼を言わせてもらおう、冒険者。
次は「ウルダハ」へ向かってくれ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_000_070<tab>Ah, you are returned. How fared the investigation? You must tell me everything you have learned!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_000_070<tab>やあ君、お疲れさま！
潜入捜査の結果はどうでしたか？

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_000_071<tab>...A magicked pattern? By the gods, how many ways are there to usher in the Night of Devilry? And to think that you might have been party to it if not for the Lominsans' unwitting intervention!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_000_071<tab>……魔法陣を使って魔物を集め、「魔人の夜」の再現を！？
なるほど、妨害する必要もなく、失敗したんですね。
いったい、何をしたいのやら……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_000_072<tab>But the danger is not passed. The illusionist bade you help out with the festivities in Ul'dah, which means that yet another scheme is in progress. And having failed in their attempts thus far, I fear that the Continental Circus will stop at nothing to see its dark ambition realized.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_000_072<tab>次は「ウルダハ」に向かうよう言われたのですね。
失敗が続いてますから、彼らも本気を出してくるかも……！

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_000_073<tab>Make no mistake, the situation is coming to a head. We must continue our investigation in Ul'dah. Make your way there as soon as you are able, and meet me in the vicinity of the Ruby Road Exchange. Safe travels!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_000_073<tab>「ウルダハ」へ行って、潜入捜査を続行しましょう。
先に「ルビーロード国際市場」付近に行って、待っています！

source: TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_000_080<tab>'Tis good to see you, my friend. You must be weary from the road. Take a moment to catch your breath, and I will share with you what I have managed to learn thus far.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW102_00237_GODRIQUELAIN_000_080<tab>待っていましたよ！
さぁ、一息ついたら、捜査を続行しましょう。
